snippet: We kill millions of “pest” animals each year, without the science to justify it....
abstract: Richard Conniff Op-Ed article examines efforts of Agriculture Dept's Wildlife Services agency, appointed with job of killing predators in United States, to avoid transparency about efficacy of its operations; notes study published in journal Frontiers in Ecology and Environment finds predator control unproven method of protecting livestock.
lead_paragraph: We kill millions of “pest” animals each year, without the science to justify it.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Frontiers in Ecology and the Environment (Journal)
